CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Opportunity__r.Payment_Period__c), "15 days", 15, "30 days", 30, "45 days", 45, "60 days", 60, "75 days", 75, "90 days", 90, "120 days", 120, "150 days", 150, "180 days", 180, "30 Days ME", 60, "60 Days ME", 90, "90 Days ME", 120, 0)
